formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Future Balance = Current Balance × (1 + Investment Return Rate)^Years to Retirement + Annual Contribution × [(1 + Investment Return Rate)^Years to Retirement - 1] / Investment Return Rate

variables.meaning: homeowners insurance (annual or monthly depending on input)
